scripts.install: git clone --bare https://github.com/web-platform-tests/results-analysis-cache.git && git --git-dir=results-analysis-cache.git remote set-url --push origin git@github.com:web-platform-tests/results-analysis-cache.git || git --git-dir=results-analysis-cache.git fetch --tags
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-unit
